health+2.title: Heartbound Fortitude
health+2.description: Channel inner strength to permanently increase maximum health by 1 heart, allowing you to endure greater challenges.

health+4.title: Warrior's Resilience
health+4.description: Harness battle-hardened vitality to increase maximum health by 2 hearts, significantly improving your survival in dangerous encounters.

armor+1.title: Iron Guardian's Protection
armor+1.description: Enhance your natural defenses, gaining +1 armor point regardless of equipment worn. Your skin toughens against physical harm.

armor+2.title: Diamond Sentinel's Bulwark
armor+2.description: Master defensive techniques that grant +2 armor points, significantly reducing incoming damage even from powerful foes.

armor_toughness+1.title: Netherite Endurance
armor_toughness+1.description: Develop supernatural fortitude granting +1 armor toughness, making your defenses more effective against powerful attacks.

knockback_resistance+10%.title: Immovable Mountain Stance
knockback_resistance+10%.description: Root yourself like a mountain, gaining 10% resistance to being knocked back by enemy attacks and explosions.

minor_attack_damage_1.title: Combat Fundamentals
minor_attack_damage_1.description: Basic combat training increases your attack damage by 3%. Every strike becomes slightly more effective.

minor_attack_speed_1.title: Quick Reflexes
minor_attack_speed_1.description: Learn basic combat timing that increases attack speed by 3%. Strike just a bit faster than before.

minor_crit_chance_1.title: Precision Basics
minor_crit_chance_1.description: Develop fundamental targeting skills, gaining a 2% increased chance to land critical hits.

minor_life_steal_1.title: Blood Trickle
minor_life_steal_1.description: Learn to draw a small amount of life force from your attacks, stealing 3% of damage dealt as health.

attack_damage+5%.title: Iron Striker's Might
attack_damage+5%.description: Channel combat training to increase all attack damage by 5%, finding weak points in your enemies' defenses.

attack_damage+10%.title: Diamond Slayer's Fury
attack_damage+10%.description: Master devastating combat techniques that increase all attack damage by 10%, making each strike significantly more lethal.

attack_speed+5%.title: Golden Duelist's Swiftness
attack_speed+5%.description: Adopt agile fighting techniques that increase attack speed by 5%, allowing you to strike enemies more frequently.

attack_speed+10%.title: Netherite Blade Dancer
attack_speed+10%.description: Move with supernatural dexterity, increasing attack speed by 10% to unleash a flurry of deadly blows against your enemies.

crit_chance+5%.title: Precise Weak Point Hunter
crit_chance+5%.description: Develop a keen eye for vulnerabilities, increasing your critical hit chance by 5% to strike where it hurts most.

crit_damage+10%.title: Emerald Executioner's Edge
crit_damage+10%.description: Master lethal striking techniques, increasing critical hit damage by 10% to deliver devastating finishing blows.

life_steal+2%.title: Crimson Life Drinker
life_steal+2%.description: Infuse your strikes with vampiric energy, stealing 3% of damage dealt as health to sustain yourself in prolonged battles.

movement_speed+5%.title: Wind Walker's Grace
movement_speed+5%.description: Harness the wind's essence to move 5% faster, improving battlefield mobility and exploration speed.

dodge_chance+3%.title: Phantom Sidestep
dodge_chance+3%.description: Move with supernatural reflexes, gaining a 3% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks through quick maneuvering.

tank_specialization.title: Bulwark of the Immortal Fortress
tank_specialization.description: Become a living fortress with +2 armor and +4 hearts, allowing you to endure tremendous punishment and protect your allies.

melee_specialization.title: Blade Sovereign's Wrath
melee_specialization.description: Master the art of close combat, gaining 10% attack damage and 5% attack speed to become a fearsome frontline warrior.

minor_health.title: Vitality Spark
minor_health.description: Awaken innate life energy, adding half a heart to your maximum health to better withstand injuries.

medium_health.title: Heart of Endurance
medium_health.description: Strengthen your life force, adding one full heart to your maximum health for improved survival.

major_health.title: Soul of the Immortal
major_health.description: Greatly expand your life essence, adding two full hearts to significantly improve your chance of survival.

minor_armor.title: Hardened Skin
minor_armor.description: Toughen your skin to gain +0.5 armor points, providing a small but helpful defense against physical attacks.

medium_armor.title: Iron Flesh Barrier
medium_armor.description: Develop resilient flesh that grants +1 armor point, noticeably reducing damage from enemy attacks.

major_armor.title: Diamond Hide Defender
major_armor.description: Transform your body to gain +2 armor points, significantly reducing incoming damage from all sources.

minor_toughness.title: Resolute Defense
minor_toughness.description: Develop resilience against powerful attacks, gaining +0.5 armor toughness to better withstand heavy blows.

medium_toughness.title: Unyielding Bastion
medium_toughness.description: Master defensive techniques that grant +1 armor toughness, making your armor significantly more effective.

minor_knockback_res.title: Steadfast Footing
minor_knockback_res.description: Plant your feet firmly to gain 3% knockback resistance, making you harder to displace in combat.

medium_knockback_res.title: Mountain's Stance
medium_knockback_res.description: Become as immovable as a mountain with 5% knockback resistance, better withstanding powerful attacks.

minor_dodge.title: Swift Evasion
minor_dodge.description: Develop basic evasive maneuvers, gaining a 3% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks.

medium_dodge.title: Shadow Dancer
medium_dodge.description: Move with increased agility to gain a 2% chance of dodging attacks entirely through quick reflexes.

major_dodge.title: Phantom's Mirage
major_dodge.description: Move like a phantom to gain a 3% chance to completely evade incoming attacks through supernatural reflexes.

minor_attack_damage.title: Warrior's Edge
minor_attack_damage.description: Sharpen your combat techniques to increase attack damage by 3%, making each strike more effective.

medium_attack_damage.title: Soldier's Strength
medium_attack_damage.description: Enhance your striking power to increase attack damage by 4%, delivering more decisive blows.

major_attack_damage.title: Champion's Might
major_attack_damage.description: Master combat techniques that increase attack damage by 5%, making you significantly more deadly in combat.

minor_attack_speed.title: Swift Strikes
minor_attack_speed.description: Develop faster combat techniques to increase attack speed by 2%, allowing for quicker strikes.

medium_attack_speed.title: Rapid Combatant
medium_attack_speed.description: Refine your attack rhythms to increase attack speed by 3%, delivering more strikes in less time.

minor_crit_chance.title: Keen Eye
minor_crit_chance.description: Train to spot weaknesses in enemy defenses, gaining a 2% increased chance to land critical hits.

medium_crit_chance.title: Vulnerability Hunter
medium_crit_chance.description: Master the art of finding weak points, gaining a 3% increased chance to deal critical damage.

minor_crit_damage.title: Precise Striker
minor_crit_damage.description: Learn to make your critical hits 5% more devastating by striking with greater precision.

medium_crit_damage.title: Devastating Precision
medium_crit_damage.description: Master the art of targeting vital areas, making your critical hits 10% more powerful.

minor_life_steal.title: Blood Siphon
minor_life_steal.description: Infuse your attacks with vampiric energy, stealing 3% of damage dealt as health to sustain yourself.

medium_life_steal.title: Essence Drain
medium_life_steal.description: Enhance your vampiric abilities to steal 2% of damage dealt as health, significantly improving combat sustainability.

minor_movement_speed.title: Swift Steps
minor_movement_speed.description: Develop lighter steps to move 2% faster, enhancing your overall mobility in combat.

armor_pierce.title: Phantom Strike Technique
armor_pierce.description: Master the secret arts of bypassing defenses, ignoring 5% of your target's armor. Your attacks find the joints and weaknesses in any protection, striking as if facing a less armored foe.

armor_shred.title: Ruinous Armor Degradation
armor_shred.description: Your strikes weaken the very structure of armor, temporarily reducing target's protection by 3%. Each hit degrades their defenses, making subsequent attacks increasingly deadly as the battle continues.

current_hp_damage.title: Blood Strike
current_hp_damage.description: Channel your own vitality into devastating attacks, dealing additional damage equal to 10% of your current health. The more health you have, the more powerful your strikes become, encouraging you to maintain peak condition for maximum offensive power.

major_current_hp_damage.title: Blood Bath
major_current_hp_damage.description: Channel your own vitality into devastating attacks, dealing additional damage equal to 20% of your current health. The more health you have, the more powerful your strikes become, encouraging you to maintain peak condition for maximum offensive power.

attack_knockback.title: Titan's Forceful Impact
attack_knockback.description: Your strikes carry tremendous force, increasing knockback by 0.5. Enemies are sent flying farther when struck, creating tactical distance and preventing them from retaliating immediately.

critical_bonus_damage.title: Assassin's Fatal Strike
critical_bonus_damage.description: Master the art of exploiting weaknesses, increasing critical hit bonus damage by 5%. When your strikes find vital points, they deal devastating additional damage, often ending fights in a single, perfect blow.

sweeping_damage_ratio.title: Blade Dancer's Whirlwind
sweeping_damage_ratio.description: Your sword techniques evolve into deadly arcs, increasing sweeping damage by 10%. Cut through multiple foes with devastating efficiency as your blade dances from one target to the next in elegant, deadly patterns.

explosion_knockback_resistance.title: Blast Anchoring
explosion_knockback_resistance.description: Your stance widens instinctively when explosions occur, granting 10% resistance to explosion knockback. While others are sent flying, you maintain your footing against devastating blasts.

overheal.title: Life Essence Overflow
overheal.description: Your body can temporarily sustain more life energy than normal, allowing healing to exceed your maximum health by 5%. This excess vitality gradually fades over time but provides crucial protection in dangerous situations.

healing_received.title: Vitality Amplification
healing_received.description: Your body resonates with life-giving energies, increasing healing received by 10%. Potions, regeneration effects, and other healing sources restore significantly more health, making recovery far more efficient.

prot_pierce.title: Enchantment Nullifier
prot_pierce.description: You've studied the arcane weaknesses of magical protection, allowing your attacks to bypass 2 points of enchantment protection. Your weapon strikes slice through magical barriers as if they were mere illusions.

prot_shred.title: Warding Dissolution
prot_shred.description: Your attacks erode magical defenses, temporarily reducing enchantment protection by 3%. Each strike weakens the arcane shields surrounding your enemy, rendering them increasingly vulnerable to subsequent blows.
